subject: Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Steven Holcomb of the United States and Ivo Rüegg of Switzerland tied for first place in a two-man bobsled World Cup race Saturday in Cesana, Italy.
snippet: Steven Holcomb of the United States and Ivo Rüegg of Switzerland tied for first place in a two-man bobsled World Cup race Saturday in Cesana, Italy.
